title: Moist Gingerbread
ingredients: ['100g caster sugar', '110g unsalted butter', '1 egg', '350g black treacle', '310g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '250ml hot water']
